welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Hollywood, a city known for its vibrant energy, charming neighborhoods, and diverse culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Copa Airlines, and Great Lakes Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
